template.iframeCode:
<button onclick="importer.requestDataFromUser().then(function(results) 
{ // do something with the results

return
})">Start Import</button>

<script src="https://unpkg.com/@flatfile/adapter/build/dist/index.min.js"></script>

<script>
const importer = new FlatfileImporter('1964b83c-3c93-495d-81c5-b8c40ecca039', {
  type: "imports",
  fields: [
      {key: "plant_id", label: "Plant ID"},
      {key: "line_accession", label: "Line or accession"},
      {key: "height_cm", label: "Height (cm)"},
      {key: "local_id", label: "Local (custom to you) ID"},
    	{key: "experiment_id", label: "Experiment ID"},
      {key: "container_id", label: "Container ID"},
      {key: "containing_position", label: "Position in container"}
    ],
    type: "Sample Import",
    managed: true,
  allowCustom: true
});

importer.setCustomer({userId: "12345"});
</script>

update.iframeCode:
<button onclick="importer.requestDataFromUser().then(function(results) 
{ // do something with the results
console.log(results)
return
})">Start Import</button>

<script src="https://unpkg.com/@flatfile/adapter/build/dist/index.min.js"></script>

<script>
const importer = new FlatfileImporter('1964b83c-3c93-495d-81c5-b8c40ecca039', {
  type: "imports",
  fields: [
      {key: "plant_id", label: "Plant ID"},
      {key: "line_accession", label: "Line or accession"},
      {key: "height_cm", label: "Height (cm)"},
      {key: "local_id", label: "Local (custom to you) ID"},
    	{key: "experiment_id", label: "Experiment ID"},
      {key: "container_id", label: "Container ID"},
      {key: "containing_position", label: "Position in container"}
    ],
    type: "Sample Import",
    managed: true,
  allowCustom: true
});

importer.setCustomer({userId: "12345"});
</script>
